description.displayText: I have known Norma for over 10 years.  She has helped me out on numerous occassions, watching my two children and my dogs. She is a dependable, kind, caring and simply a wonderful person.
description.originalText: I have known Norma for over 10 years.  She has helped me out on numerous occassions, watching my two children and my dogs. She is a dependable, kind, caring and simply a wonderful person.

description.displayText: We have a 5 year old girl who was diagnosed with autism and has a moderate speech delay as well as a very rambunctious 3 year old girl.  Norma has established  a wonderful rapport with both girls over the course of the past few years.  She is very observant and sensitive to the mannerisms / moods of our 5 year old and can usually divert her negative behavior before it escalates.  At the same time she is able to engage and appease the curiosity of the attention seeking 3 year old.  She has also done an incredible job of developing and enriching a bilingual vocabulary with our 3 year old.  She is thoroughly dependable and trustworthy with our little ones and we can wholeheartedly recommend her to your family.

description.displayText:
She is a teacher and loves working with children. Her students speak highly of her. 
She is also a dear friend and excellent person. She has high morals and standards. She cared for my 10 year old son and 5 year old daughter. My daughter told me she is "the best babysitter ever!" I know I do not have to worry about my children in her care.
